text: The 2018–19 Hong Kong Second Division League was the 5th season of the Hong Kong Second Division since it became the third-tier football league in Hong Kong in 2014–15. The season began on 9 September 2018 and ended on 26 May 2019. ==Teams== ===Changes from last season=== ====From Second Division==== =====Promoted to First Division===== * Happy Valley * Central & Western =====Relegated to Third Division===== * Kwai Tsing * GFC Friends * Sai Kung * Fukien ====To Second Division==== =====Relegated from First Division===== * Sun Hei * Tung Sing * Kwun Tong * Wan Chai =====Promoted from Third Division===== * North District * St. Joseph's ==League table== ==References== Category:Hong Kong Second Division League seasons Category:2018–19 in Hong Kong football
title: 2018–19 Hong Kong Second Division League
